title: BRIEF-Just Energy qtrly base funds from operations increased 39 pct to $52.6 mln | Reuters
text:
Market News | Wed Nov 9, 2016 | 5:16pm EST BRIEF-Just Energy qtrly base funds from operations increased 39 pct to $52.6 mln 
Nov 9 Just Energy Group Inc 
* Qtrly base funds from operations increased 39% to $52.6 million from $37.8 million 
* Management reaffirms its full year fiscal 2017 base ebitda guidance of $223 million to $233 million 
* Sales of $992.8 million for q2 of fiscal 2017 decreased 9% from sales of $1,087.3 million in prior year 
* Just energy reports second quarter fiscal 2017 results Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: Next In Market News
